评论详情: Fit pretry good. My son is 5'3 and 100 pounds. A bit loose feeling on the waist nd will give heel bite depending on height. Material is well and pockets are deep. Perfect for anything (:

It’s an odd fabric yes but I’ve been wearing this almost daily since I’ve gotten them and they are holding up really well the fit is absolutely perfect I have a very small waist and it fit perfectly without any need for adjustments the pockets are humongous I was able to fit 4books and two games in one pocket I will have to say the pockets near your waist started to rip already

Photo is an XXLg. Cute pants but the waist would be a medium at most. Just ridiculous. Followed recommendation for sz XL and then went up a size just for x bagginess with 2X.  Jokes on me, that waist was completely unrealistic for a normal adult.

they are the perfect amount of baggy & they look great! pockets are functional & deep and there are drawstrings on the waist and ankles. the fabric feels a little bit cheap but it's manageable and for the price it's fine. i have a small waist so it's not a problem for me but the waistband is very tight and could be uncomfortable.
Exactly as pictured and fits perfectly. Its warm and comfy

My granddaughter loves these pants. My wife had a hard time getting her to allow them to be washed before she wore them. They seem to be made with high quality material and the seams are strong. We will purchase other colors soon.

Loved the pants, but the waist band is so reduced that it was not easy to get the pants over my thighs/butt. If you don’t mind struggling to put them on and off go for it, but i don’t like the stress of dealing with that to wear pants.
We bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas, and she is very pleased with them.  Unfortunately, they didn't arrive until the week AFTER Christmas...

评论概述: Runs large. Nice pants for someone bigger.
评论详情: Nice pants, but order a size down.
Purchased for family member. The fabric was tough but the stitching not good. Pockets falling off due to bad stitching. Issues with stitching coming off all over!
Item does not look or feel like the picture.  I ordered a 2 xl and it's so small ! Just like a size small! Such a shame. Glad they refunded me!

评论概述: Feels like a thick plastic bag
评论详情: So uncomfortable! Do not buy this!

This is actually a really  good product. I surfed Amazon for days looking for the perfect pair of cargo pants at a good price, and I think I found them! These are perfect for school and do not wrinkle at all. That way I don’t have to worry about optioning or washing them. I got a black and green pair and they r so cute!! I will continue to look for all those out there who need more cargo pants suggestions, but overall these r pretty awesome! The only problem is they r a bit thin, but it makes them really breathable. (NOT see through) They have adjustable straps and simple pockets. TBH, I think these are great, and perfect for a teen budget. I know some other reviews might disagree, but overall I had no problem with these. Recommend! (The name is Erick because I am writing from my fathers acc)
